body_html:
@facaiy
Can you explain this operation?
https://github.com/facaiy/tensorflow/blob/006871750bb76dda4dfa65e0c707ca12e759d6f8/tensorflow/contrib/opt/python/training/adamax.py#L124
lr = (lr_t * math_ops.sqrt(1 - beta2_power) / (1 - beta1_power))
Is this required in adamax?
